name: Light Camera Carnage [Blueberry Jam Edition]
description:
You are an actor trapped in his filmography, right now you are on a loop on that weird Sci Fi movie you made in those bad times of your life...

It's time to get out!

Fight using wacky weapons as a cactus launcher, kill tons of enemies in your way out!
Every map is randomly generated! Tons of possibilities, tons of places to die in.
Or there will be in the future!

Controls (keyboard):
Aim - Move mouse
Shoot - Left Mouse Button
Move - WASD
Pick Up Weapon - F
Switch Weapon Hands - Space
Pause - Escape

Lights...Camera...Carnage! was made as an entry for the Blueberry Jam, hosted by GameDevNetwork: https://itch.io/jam/game-dev-n...

Design/Code:
- Etienne "Hayaweh" Rocipon
- Ludovic "Dacove" Tresson

Design/Art:  
- Iván Romero Cuenca

External credits:
- A couple of sounds from Freesound.org (title, death)
- A musician exterior to the theme for the level theme
- PolyNav2D from ParadoxNotion (Unity Asset Store)

All the rest of the assets and code has been made by the team internally during the week.

Made in Unity 2017.1.0b8

Oh btw, this is only a prototype, unoptimized, 99% incomplete... But with sort-of clean base because this project is not stopping here ;) 

Thanks <3
